snippet: London has been gradually moving to restore full diplomatic relations with Iran, whose role in the region is crucial amid the violence in Iraq and Syria.
abstract: Decision to reopen the British Embassy in Tehran is the culmination of a gradual effort to improve ties with Iran since the election of President Hassan Rouhani and a new Iranian seriousness about negotiating on the country’s contentious nuclear program; having a trusted ally back on the ground to report and gather intelligence is seen as beneficial to the United States and Israel as well.
lead_paragraph: London has been gradually moving to restore full diplomatic relations with Iran, whose role in the region is crucial amid the violence in Iraq and Syria.

headline.main: Britain’s Thaw With Iran, Coming at a Crucial Juncture, Could Be Useful to Allies
headline.print_headline: Britain’s Thaw With Iran, Coming at a Crucial Juncture, Could Be Useful to Allies

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
